modName: Pack - Wallpaper for Win or Mac
summary: Just some ss that I've take into my skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Hello There;

This is my first upload to Nexus. Yeah I know, not a big deal....

Anyway, I'm learning how to make mods so soon I pretend to bring some companions, but I can't provide a date or anything like that.

[b][center][size=4]In this file you will found:[/size][/center][/b]

[size=4][b]- 31 HD Wallpapers for any operational system;
- 14 Landscape shots;
- 7 Characters shots;
- 4 Sky shots;
- 1 Giant Flying Ship (Seriosly);
- 2 Sppriggan shots;
- 2 NPCs shots;
- 1 Sword Shot.[/b][/size]

[center][size=3][b]How to Install[/b][/size][/center]

[center]Unpack the file in any folder - Select the image and then choose to use as a Wallpaper.[/center]

Pretty Easy.
author: Caio Mouriz
